title: Looking at Leeuwin
creator_credit: Australia. Navy Office. Directorate of Public Relations
brief_description: Royal Australian Navy’s Junior Recruit Training establishment HMAS Leeuwin at Fremantle in Western Australia. Shows junior recruits at academic and practical classes, on board a Navy destroyer and at sport and play. Discusses further opportunities for junior recruits after their graduation.
